text: Hey all, I need to create around 500 lists in HS with various filters. Anyone setup a spreadsheet that works through the lists API?

<@UP452DA2Z> you can create an application to read from spreadsheet and create the list on HubSpot, you can use - <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-php>
<https://github.com/HubSpot/integration-examples-php>

always welcome!

You might also use `app script` instead of any other tool - <https://developers.google.com/apps-script/api>

Hello! Question about this endpoint... what if idk the id of the page? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/post_pages_page_id_restore_deleted>

Thanks!
I tried to use the list pages endpoint, but the deleted pages don't seem to be listed...
